tactics.name: reflexivity
tactics.description: Solves the goal if it is a trivial equality.

tactics.name: rewrite
tactics.description: Given some known equality `a = b`, the rewrite tactic lets you replace `a` with `b` or vice versa in a goal or hypothesis

theorems.name: add_zero
theorems.statement:
Fact add_zero (n : mynat) :
   n + O = n.

theorems.name: add_succ
theorems.statement:
Fact add_succ (m n : mynat) :
   n + (S m) = S (n + m).

theorems.name: add_zero
theorems.statement:
Fact add_zero (n : mynat) :
   n + O = n.

theorems.name: add_succ
theorems.statement:
Fact add_succ (m n : mynat) :
   n + (S m) = S (n + m).

theorems.name: zero_add
theorems.statement:
Lemma zero_add (n : mynat) :
   O + n = n.

theorems.name: add_assoc
theorems.statement:
Lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) :
   (a + b) + c = a + (b + c).

theorems.name: succ_add
theorems.statement:
Lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) :
   S a + b = S (a + b).

theorems.name: add_comm
theorems.statement:
Lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) :
   a + b = b + a.

theorems.name: succ_eq_add_one
theorems.statement:
Lemma succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) :
   S n = n + I.
